requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 11400H or Ryzen 5 4600H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050Ti or AMD RX 570
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 11700 or Ryzen 7 4800H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 or AMD RX 6600 XT
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
